title: Psalms 95:1
text: O COME, let us sing unto the LORD: let us make a joyful noise to the rock of our salvation.

title: Psalms 95:2
text: Let us come before his presence with thanksgiving, and make a joyful noise unto him with psalms.

title: Psalms 95:3
text: For the LORD is a great God, and a great King above all gods.

title: Psalms 95:4
text: In his hand are the deep places of the earth: the strength of the hills is his also.

title: Psalms 95:5
text: The sea is his, and he made it: and his hands formed the dry land.

title: Psalms 95:6
text: O come, let us worship and bow down: let us kneel before the LORD our maker.

title: Psalms 95:7
text: For he is our God; and we are the people of his pasture, and the sheep of his hand.  To day if ye will hear his voice,

title: Psalms 95:8
text: Harden not your heart, as in the provocation, and as in the day of temptation in the wilderness:

title: Psalms 95:9
text: When your fathers tempted me, proved me, and saw my work.

title: Psalms 95:10
text: Forty years long was I grieved with this generation, and said, It is a people that do err in their heart, and they have not known my ways:

title: Psalms 95:11
text: Unto whom I sware in my wrath that they should not enter into my rest.
